memberdef.argsstring: (const SystemOfBodies &bodies, const std::shared_ptr< estimatable_parameters::EstimatableParameterSet< ObservationScalarType > > parametersToEstimate, const observation_models::SortedObservationSettingsMap &observationSettingsMap, const std::shared_ptr< numerical_integrators::IntegratorSettings< TimeType > > integratorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< propagators::PropagatorSettings< ObservationScalarType > > propagatorSettings, const bool propagateOnCreation=true)
memberdef.name: OrbitDeterminationManager

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor
bodies
Map of body objects with names of bodies, storing all environment models used in simulation.
parametersToEstimate
Container object for all parameters that are to be estimated
observationSettingsMap
Sets of observation model settings per link ends (i.e. transmitter, receiver, etc.) per observable type for which measurement data is to be provided in orbit determination process (through estimateParameters function)
integratorSettings
Settings for numerical integrator.
propagatorSettings
Settings for propagator.
propagateOnCreation
Boolean denoting whether initial propagatoon is to be performed upon object creation (default true)

memberdef.name: getObservationManagers

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve map of all observation managers.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve map of all observation managers. A single observation manager can simulate observations and calculate observation partials for all link ends involved in the given observable type.
Map of observation managers for all observable types involved in current orbit determination.

memberdef.definition: std::map< observation_models::ObservableType, std::shared_ptr< observation_models::ObservationSimulatorBase< ObservationScalarType, TimeType > > > tudat::simulation_setup::OrbitDeterminationManager< ObservationScalarType, TimeType, type >::getObservationSimulators
memberdef.name: getObservationSimulators

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve map of all observation simulators.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve map of all observation simulators. A single observation simulators can simulate observations all link ends involved in the given observable type. The observation simulators are retrieved from the observation manager objects (that are stored in the observationManagers_ map).
Map of observation simulators for all observable types involved in current orbit determination.

memberdef.argsstring: (const PodInputType &observationsAndTimes, const int parameterVectorSize, const int totalObservationSize, std::pair< Eigen::VectorXd, Eigen::MatrixXd > &residualsAndPartials)
memberdef.name: calculateObservationMatrixAndResiduals

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the observation partials matrix and residuals.

detaileddescription.para:
This function calculates the observation partials matrix and residuals, based on the state transition matrix, sensitivity matrix and body states resulting from the previous numerical integration iteration. Partials and observations are calculated by the observationManagers_.
observationsAndTimes
Observable values and associated time tags, per observable type and set of link ends.
parameterVectorSize
Length of the vector of estimated parameters
totalObservationSize
Total number of observations in observationsAndTimes map.
residualsAndPartials
Pair of residuals of computed w.r.t. input observable values and partials of observables w.r.t. parameter vector (return by reference).

briefdescription.para: Function to normalize the matrix of partial derivatives so that each column is in the range [-1,1].

detaileddescription.para:
Function to normalize the matrix of partial derivatives so that each column is in the range [-1,1]
observationMatrix
Matrix of partial derivatives. Matrix modified by this function, and normalized matrix is returned by reference
Vector with scaling values used for normalization

memberdef.definition: std::shared_ptr< PodOutput< ObservationScalarType, TimeType > > tudat::simulation_setup::OrbitDeterminationManager< ObservationScalarType, TimeType, type >::estimateParameters
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< PodInput< ObservationScalarType, TimeType > > podInput, std::shared_ptr< EstimationConvergenceChecker > convergenceChecker=std::make_shared< EstimationConvergenceChecker >())
memberdef.name: estimateParameters

briefdescription.para: Function to perform parameter estimation from measurement data.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to perform parameter estimation, including orbit determination, i.e. body initial states, from measurement data. All observable types and link ends per obsevable types that are included in the measurement data input must have been provided to the constructor by the observationSettingsMap parameter.
podInput
Object containing all measurement data, associated metadata, including measurement weight, and a priori estimate for covariance matrix and parameter adjustment.
convergenceChecker
Object used to check convergence/termination of algorithm
Object containing estimated parameter value and associateed data, such as residuals and observation partials.

briefdescription.para: Function to reset the current parameter estimate.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to reset the current parameter estimate; reintegrates the variational equations and equations of motion with new estimate.
newParameterEstimate
New estimate of parameter vector.
reintegrateVariationalEquations
Boolean denoting whether the variational equations are to be reintegrated

memberdef.definition: std::shared_ptr< propagators::VariationalEquationsSolver< ObservationScalarType, TimeType > > tudat::simulation_setup::OrbitDeterminationManager< ObservationScalarType, TimeType, type >::getVariationalEquationsSolver
memberdef.name: getVariationalEquationsSolver

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the object to numerical integrate and update the variational equations and equations of motion.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the object to numerical integrate and update the variational equations and equations of motion
Object to numerical integrate and update the variational equations and equations of motion

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve an observation manager.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve an observation manager for a single observable type. The observation manager can simulate observations and calculate observation partials for all link ends involved in the given observable type.
observableType
Type of observable for which manager is to be retrieved.
Observation manager for given observable type.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the current paramater estimate.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the current paramater estimate.
Current paramater estimate.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the object used to propagate/process the solution of the variational equations/dynamics.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the object used to propagate/process the numerical solution of the variational. equations/dynamics.
Object used to propagate/process the numerical solution of the variational equations/dynamics.

memberdef.definition: static std::vector< int > tudat::simulation_setup::OrbitDeterminationManager< ObservationScalarType, TimeType, type >::getNumberOfObservationsPerLinkEnd
memberdef.name: getNumberOfObservationsPerLinkEnd

briefdescription.para: Function to determine the number of observations per link end.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to determine the number of observations per link end from a map of observations for each link ends. The input type is directly related to the data stored for a single observable in PodInput::PodInputDataType.
dataPerLinkEnd
Map of observations and times for a set of link ends.
Vector of size of number of observations in input map (in order of forward iterator over input map).

memberdef.definition: static std::pair< std::map< observation_models::ObservableType, int >, int > tudat::simulation_setup::OrbitDeterminationManager< ObservationScalarType, TimeType, type >::getNumberOfObservationsPerObservable
memberdef.name: getNumberOfObservationsPerObservable

briefdescription.para: Function to determine total number of observation and number of observations per observable.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to determine total number of observation and number of observations per observable from the complete set of measurement data.
observationsAndTimes
Set of measurement data per obsevable type and link ends
Pair first: map with number of observations per observable type, second: total number of observations (i.e. sum of valus of first)

briefdescription.para: Function to convert from one representation of all measurement data to the other.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to convert from one representation of all measurement data (AlternativePodInputType) to the other (PodInputType). In the former, the vector of times and vector of associated observations are stored separately. In the latter, they are stored as a map with time as key and obsevation as value.
alternativePodInput
Original representation of measurement data
Converted measurement data.

memberdef.argsstring: (const SystemOfBodies &bodies, const observation_models::SortedObservationSettingsMap &observationSettingsMap, const std::vector< std::shared_ptr< numerical_integrators::IntegratorSettings< TimeType > > > integratorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< propagators::PropagatorSettings< ObservationScalarType > > propagatorSettings, const bool propagateOnCreation=true)
memberdef.name: initializeOrbitDeterminationManager

briefdescription.para: Function called by either constructor to initialize the object.

detaileddescription.para:
Function called by either constructor to initialize the object.
bodies
Map of body objects with names of bodies, storing all environment models used in simulation.
observationSettingsMap
Sets of observation model settings per link ends (i.e. transmitter, receiver, etc.) for which measurement data is to be provided in orbit determination process (through estimateParameters function)
integratorSettings
Settings for numerical integrator.
propagatorSettings
Settings for propagator.
propagateOnCreation
Boolean denoting whether initial propagatoon is to be performed upon object creation (default true)

briefdescription.para: Top-level class for performing orbit determination.

detaileddescription.para: Top-level class for performing orbit determination. All required propagation/estimation settings are provided to this class, which then creates all objects needed for the propagation and estimation process. The parameter estimation itself is performed by providing measurement data and related metadata (as PodInput) to the estimateParameters function.
